# Complex2Img interface file
!BRIEF [-complex] <input> [-out] <output image>

!CATEGORY "input/output options :"

  !PARAMETER -complex
    !ALIAS -c
    !TYPE string
    !KEYLESS 1
    !REQUIRED true
    !VISIBILITY simple
    !BRIEF Input filename of the protein complex
  !END

  !PARAMETER -out
    !ALIAS -o
    !TYPE string
    !REQUIRED true
    !KEYLESS 2
    !VISIBILITY simple
    !BRIEF Output filename
  !END

!END
